segments.text: Hi , the lab said that you would be getting my test results in today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like you to come in and discuss some further tests that I would like to run .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that this is a bad sign .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For now , I would like to run a few more tests to look into some of the problems that you mentioned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why wouldn â€™ t you tell me over the phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If there is any question about test results , we always do a recheck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to come in right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be happy to see you this afternoon . If you are feeling upset , please bring a friend or relative along .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on in this afternoon and we will talk . It will be fine !
segments.speaker: S2
